original_title: Slightly Stoopid: Live in San Diego
overview: San Diego band Slightly Stoopid have been honing their irresistible mix of reggae, blues, hip-hop and punk for more than a decade. In this triumphant live concert from Thanksgiving weekend 2005, they bring their definitive sound back to their hometown. In their first-ever video recording at the House of Blues, the band delivers everything their die-hard fans could want, including such favorites as "Bandelero," "Johnny Law" and "Anti Socialistic."
title: Slightly Stoopid: Live in San Diego
